display: Connecting Rod, Engine >> Mechanical (Specifications) >> Clearance Specifications
title: Clearance Specifications
content:
DIMENSIONS:
 Bearing Clearance .................... 0.005 - 0.074 mm (0.0002 - 0.0029 inch)
 Piston Pin Bore Diameter .................... 24.940 - 24.978 mm (0.9819 - 0.9834 inch)
 Side Clearance (Two Rods) .................... 0.25 - 0.46 mm (0.010 - 0.018 inch)
 Total Weight (Less Bearing) .................... 739 grams (26.1 ounces)
